favoriteSong.Ayat1: Before Jehovah's aweful throne, ye nations, bow with sacred joy; know that the Lord is God alone: he can create, and he destroy.
favoriteSong.Ayat2: His sovereign power, without our aid,made us of clay, and formed us then; and, when like wandering sheep we strayed, he brought us to his fold again.
favoriteSong.Ayat3: We'll crowd thy gates with thankful songs, high as the heavens our voices raise; and earth, with her ten thousand tongues, shall fill thy courts with sounding praise.
favoriteSong.Ayat4: Wide as the world is thy command, vast as eternity thy love; firm as a rock thy truth must stand, when rolling years shall cease to move.

favoriteSong.Ayat1: Di hadapan hadirat Hu Hai bangsa-bangsa tunduklah Ketahuilah olehmu, Khalikmu itulah Allah.
favoriteSong.Ayat2: Dari debu dan tanahlah Kita dijadikan Tuhan Dan bila tersesat kita, Tuhan tak akan tinggalkan.
favoriteSong.Ayat3: Kuasa dan kasih Allah Memenuhi segnap dunia Tetap teguhlah firman-Nya,Hingga penuh hadirat-Nya.
favoriteSong.Ayat4: Di pintu Surga yang suci Menyanyi beribu lidah Tuhan kita akan puji, Sampai slama-lamanya.

data.Search: 13*Lord We Come Before Thee Now*William Hammond*Lord we come before Thee now At Thy feet we humbly bow O do not our suit disdain! Shall we seek Thee Lord in vain Shall we seek Thee Lord, in vain*Lord on Thee our souls depend In compassion now descend Fill our hearts with Thy rich grace Tune our lips to sing Thy praise Tune our lips to sing Thy praise*Send some message from Thy word That may joy and peace afford Let Thy Spirit now impart Full salvation to each heart Full salvation to each heart*Comfort those who weep and mourn Let the time of joy return Those that are cast down lift up Make them strong in faith and hope Make them strong in faith and hope*Grant that all may seek and find Thee a God supremely kind Heal the sick the captive free Make them strong in faith and hope Make them strong in faith and hope
data.Judul: Lord, We Come Before Thee Now
data.Ayat1: Lord, we come before Thee now, At Thy feet we humbly bow. O do not our suit disdain! Shall we seek Thee, Lord, in vain? Shall we seek Thee, Lord, in vain?
data.Ayat2: Lord, on Thee our souls depend. In compassion now descend, Fill our hearts with Thy rich grace, Tune our lips to sing Thy praise, Tune our lips to sing Thy praise.
data.Ayat3: Send some message from Thy word That may joy and peace afford. Let Thy Spirit now impart. Full salvation to each heart, Full salvation to each heart.
data.Ayat4: Comfort those who weep and mourn, Let the time of joy return. Those that are cast down lift up, Make them strong in faith and hope, Make them strong in faith and hope.
data.Ayat5: Grant that all may seek, and find Thee a God supremely kind. Heal the sick, the captive free. Make them strong in faith and hope, Make them strong in faith and hope.

data.Search: 14*Kami Datang PadaMu*William Hammond*Kami datang pada-Mu Menyembah di kaki-Mu Janganlah tolak kami Tuhanlah kami cari Tuhanlah kami cari*Kami harap pada-Mu Bri kasihan sepenuh Isikan hati kami Dengan rahmat dan puji Dengan rahmat dan puji*Brikan kami ya Tuhan Damai dan kesukaan Brikanlah oleh Roh-mu Keslamatan yang penuh Keslamatan yang penuh*Yang berduka hiburkan Brikanlah kesenangan Tang tlah jatuh angkatlah Teguhkanlah imannya Teguhkanlah imannya*Brikan pada yang cari Rahmat-Mu serta kasih Bebaskanlah tawanan Dan brikan kesukaan Dan brikan kesukaan
data.Ayat1: Kami datang pada-Mu, Menyembah di kaki-Mu. Janganlah tolak kami! Tuhanlah kami cari! Tuhanlah kami cari!
data.Ayat2: Kami harap pada-Mu, Bri kasihan sepenuh. Isikan hati kami, Dengan rahmat dan puji, Dengan rahmat dan puji.
data.Ayat3: Brikan kami, ya Tuhan, Damai dan kesukaan. Brikanlah oleh Roh-mu, Keslamatan yang penuh, Keslamatan yang penuh.
data.Ayat4: Yang berduka, hiburkan, Brikanlah kesenangan. Tang tlah jatuh, angkatlah, Teguhkanlah iman-nya, Teguhkanlah iman-nya
data.Ayat5: Brikan pada yang cari, Rahmat-Mu serta kasih. Bebaskanlah tawanan, Dan brikan kesukaan, Dan brikan kesukaan.

data.Search: 15*Fairest Lord Jesus*Gesangbuch Munster*Fairest Lord Jesus Ruler of all nature O Thou of God and man the Son Thee will I cherish Thee will I honor Thou art my glory joy and crown*Fair are the meadows Fairer still the woodlands Robed in the blooming garb of spring Jesus is fairer Jesus is purer Who makes the woeful heart to sing*Fair is the sunshine Fairer still the moonlight And all the twinkling starry host Jesus shines brighter Jesus shines purer Than all the angels heaven can boast
data.Ayat1: Fairest Lord Jesus, Ruler of all nature, O Thou of God and man the Son! Thee will I cherish, Thee will I honor, Thou art my glory, joy, and crown
data.Ayat2: Fair are the meadows, Fairer still the woodlands, Robed in the blooming garb of spring. Jesus is fairer, Jesus is purer, Who makes the woeful heart to sing.
data.Ayat3: Fair is the sunshine, Fairer still the moonlight, And all the twinkling, starry host. Jesus shines brighter, Jesus shines purer Than all the angels heaven can boast.

data.Search: 16*Yesus Terindah*Gesangbuch Munster*Yesus terindah Raja alam semesta Anak Allah dan manusia Engkau kusembah Engkau kucinta Engkaulah Raja yang mulia*Indahlah padang Indahlah pun hutan Dihiasi bunga bunga Terlebih indah kasihnya Yesus Yang menggembirakan jiwa*Indah trang bulan Matahari juga Indahlah bintang semua Terlebih indah cahaya Yesus Lebih dari malaikatNya*
data.Ayat1: Yesus terindah, Raja alam semesta. Anak Allah dan manusia Engkau kusembah. Engkau kucinta, Engkaulah Raja yang mulia.
data.Ayat2: Indahlah padang, Indahlah pun hutan, Dihiasi bunga bunga. Terlebih indah kasihnya Yesus Yang menggembirakan jiwa.
data.Ayat3: Indah trang bulan, Matahari juga Indahlah bintang semua. Terlebih indah cahaya Yesus, Lebih dari malaikat-Nya.

data.Search: 17*Holy Holy Holy*Reginald Heber*Holy holy holy Lord God Almighty Early in the morning our song shall rise to Thee Holy holy holy merciful and mighty God over all who rules eternity*Holy holy holy Angels adore Thee Casting down their bright crowns around the glassy sea Thousands and then thousands worship low before Thee Which wert and art and evermore shalt be*Holy holy holy Though darkness hide Thee Though the eye of man Thy great glory may not see Only Thou art holy There is none beside Thee Perfect in power in love and purity
data.Ayat1: Holy, holy, holy! Lord God Al-mighty! Early in the morning our song shall rise to Thee. Holy, holy, holy! merciful and mighty! God over all who rules eternity!
data.Ayat2: Holy, holy, holy! Angels adore Thee, Casting down their bright crowns around the glassy sea. Thousands, and then thousands worship low before Thee, Which wert, and art, and evermore shalt be.
data.Ayat3: Holy, holy, holy! Though darkness hide Thee, Though the eye of man Thy great glory may not see. Only Thou art holy. There is none beside Thee, Perfect in power, in love and purity.

data.Search: 18*Suci Suci Suci*Reginald Heber*Suci suci suci Yang Maha tinggi Kami nyanyi pujian siang dan malam Suci suci suci! Allah Maha kasih Yang memerintah semesta alam*Suci suci suci! Malaikat sembah Tersungkur di bawa kaki Allah Bapa Beribu berlaksa Bersembah sujudlah Engkau yang kekal slamalamanya*Suci suci suci Meskipun skarang Wajah-Mu ya Allah tak boleh dipandang Hanya Engkau saja Lain tiada lagi Yang Mahakuasa kasih dan suci*
data.Ayat1: Suci, suci, suci! Yang Maha tinggi, Kami nyanyi pujian siang dan malam. Suci, suci, suci! Allah Maha kasih, Yang memerintah semesta alam.
data.Ayat2: Suci, suci, suci! Malaikat sembah, Tersungkur di bawa kaki Allah Bapa. Beribu, berlaksa, Bersembah sujudlah, Engkau yang kekal slama-lamanya.
data.Ayat3: Suci, suci, suci! Meskipun skarang, Wajah-Mu, ya Allah, tak boleh dipandang. Hanya Engkau saja, Lain tiada lagi, Yang Mahakuasa, kasih dan suci.

data.Search: 19*Love Divine*Charles Wesley*Love divine all loves exceling Joy of heaven to earth come down Fix in us Thy humble dwelling All thy faithful mercies crown Jesus Thou art all compassion Pure unbounded love Thou art Visit us with Thy salvation Enter every trembling heart*Breathe O breathe Thy loving Spirit Into every troubled breast Let us all in Thee in her it Let us find the prorhised rest Take away our bent to sinning Alpha and Omega be End of faith as its beginning Set our hearts at liberty*Come Almighty to deliver Let us all Thy grace receive Suddenly return and never Never more Thy temples leave Thee we would be always blessing Serve Thee as Thy hosts above Pray and praise Thee without ceasing Glory in Thy perfect love*Finish then Thy new creation Pure and spotless let us be Let us see Thy great salvation Perfectly restored in Thee Changed from glory in to glory Till in heaven we take our place Till we cast our crowns before Thee Lost in wonder love and praise
data.Ayat1: Love divine, all loves exceling, Joy of heaven to earth come down. Fix in us Thy humble dwelling, All thy faithful mercies crown! Jesus, Thou art all compassion, Pure, unbounded love Thou art. Visit us with Thy salvation, Enter every trembling heart.
data.Ayat2: Breathe, O breathe Thy loving Spirit Into every troubled breast! Let us all in Thee in her it, Let us find the prorhised rest. Take away our bent to sinning. Alpha and Omega be. End of faith, as its beginning, Set our hearts at liberty.
data.Ayat3: Come, Almighty to deliver, Let us all Thy grace receive. Suddenly return, and never, Never more Thy temples leave. Thee we would be always blessing, Serve Thee as Thy hosts above, Pray and praise Thee without ceasing, Glory in Thy perfect love.
data.Ayat4: Finish, then, Thy new creation. Pure and spotless let us be. Let us see Thy great salvation Perfectly restored in Thee. Changed from glory in to glory, Till in heaven we take our place, Till we cast our crowns before Thee, Lost in wonder, love, and praise.

data.Search: 20*Kasih Surga yang Terindah*Charles Wesley*Kasih surga yang terindah Turunlah pada kami Dalam kami bertakhtalah Dan sucikanlah hati Yesus Engkau berkasihan KasihMu ta terduga Marilah dan berkrajaan Dalam hati yang bersrah*Hembuskanlah Rohul kudus Dalam hati yang duka Agar Almasih yang tulus Bri perdamaian jiwa Engkau Tuhan berkuasa Awal dan akhir iman Buangkan dosa dari jiwa Brikanlah kemenangan*Engkaulah yang berkuasa Melepaskan umatMu Curahkan rahmat berlimpah Kuduskanlah umatMu PadaMu kami berbakti Oleh kemurahanMu Kami pun tiada berhenti Memuliakan NamaMu*Jadikan kami baharu Sempurna dalam Yesus Slamatlah oleh kasihMu Dari mati dan dosa Kami klak tiba di surga Dalam negri yang mulia Kami klak trima mahkota Dan pandang muka Yesus
data.Ayat1: Kasih surga yang terindah, Turunlah pada kami. Dalam kami bertakhtalah, Dan sucikanlah hati. Yesus Engkau berkasihan, Kasih-Mu ta' terduga. Marilah dan berkrajaan, Dalam hati yang bersrah.
data.Ayat2: Hembuskanlah Rohul kudus, Dalam hati yang duka. Agar Almasih yang tulus, Bri perdamaian jiwa. Engkau, Tuhan berkuasa, Awal dan akhir iman, Buangkan dosa dari jiwa, Brikanlah kemenangan.
data.Ayat3: Engkaulah yang berkuasa, Melepaskan umat-Mu. Curahkan rahmat berlimpah, Kuduskanlah umat-Mu. Pada-Mu kami berbakti, Oleh kemurahan-Mu. Kami pun tiada berhenti, Memuliakan Nama-Mu.
data.Ayat4: Jadikan kami baharu, Sempurna dalam Yesus, Slamatlah oleh kasih-Mu, Dari mati dan dosa. Kami klak tiba di surga, Dalam negri yang mulia, Kami klak trima mahkota, Dan pandang muka Yesus.

data.Search: 21*Take Time To Be Holy*George C Stebbins W D Longstaff*Take time to be holy Speak oft with thy Lord Abide in Him always And feed on His Word Make friends of God’s children Help those who are weak Forgetting in nothing His blessing to seek*Take time to be holy The world rushes on Spend much time in secret With Jesus alone By looking to Jesus like Him thou shalt be Thy friends in thy conduct His likeness shall see*Take time to be holy let Him be thy Guide And run not before Him Whatever betide In joy or in sorrow Still follow the Lord And looking to Jesus still trust in His Word*Take time to be holy be calm in thy soul Each thought and each motive Beneath His control Thus led by His Spirit To fountains of love Thou soon shalt be fitted For service above
data.Pengubah: George C. Stebbins, W. D. Longstaff
data.Ayat1: Take time to be holy, Speak oft with thy Lord; Abide in Him always, And feed on His Word; Make friends of God’s children, Help those who are weak, Forgetting in nothing His blessing to seek.
data.Ayat2: Take time to be holy, The world rushes on; Spend much time in secret, With Jesus alone; By looking to Jesus, like Him thou shalt be; Thy friends in thy conduct His likeness shall see.
data.Ayat3: Take time to be holy, let Him be thy Guide, And run not before Him, Whatever betide; In joy or in sorrow, Still follow the Lord, And, looking to Jesus, still trust in His Word.
data.Ayat4: Take time to be holy, be calm in thy soul, Each thought and each motive Beneath His control; Thus led by His Spirit To fountains of love, Thou soon shalt be fitted For service above.

data.Search: 22*Sucikan Hatimu*George C Stebbins W D Longstaff*Sucikan hatimu Di dalam doa Carilah Tuhanmu Dalam sabda-Nya Tunjukkanlah cinta Tolong yang lemah Minta berkat Yesus Dalam hidupmu*Sucikan hatimu Slagi di dunia Gunakan waktumu bersama Yesus Pandanglah pada-Nya Tiru kasih-Nya Buangkan sgala dosa Cari rahmat-Nya*Sucikan hatimu Oleh kuasa-Nya Yesus Pemimpinmu Di mana-mana Meski dalam duka Dan kesusahan Turut selamanya Jalannya Tuhan*Sucikan hatimu Badan dan jiwa Tundukan dirimu Pada sabda-Nya Roh-Nya yang menuntun Pada kasih-Nya Dan pasti engkau pun Tiba di surga
data.Pengubah: George C. Stebbins, W. D. Longstaff
data.Ayat1: Sucikan hatimu Di dalam doa, Carilah Tuhanmu, Dalam sabda-Nya, Tunjukkanlah cinta, Tolong yang lemah, Minta berkat Yesus; Dalam hidupmu.
data.Ayat2: Sucikan hatimu Slagi di dunia, Gunakan waktumu, bersama Yesus, Pandanglah pada-Nya, Tiru kasih-Nya, Buangkan sgala dosa, Cari rahmat-Nya.
data.Ayat3: Sucikan hatimu Oleh kuasa-Nya, Yesus Pemimpinmu, Di mana-mana; Meski dalam duka, Dan kesusahan, Turut selamanya, Jalannya Tuhan.
data.Ayat4: Sucikan hatimu Badan dan jiwa, Tundukan dirimu, Pada sabda-Nya; Roh-Nya yang menuntun, Pada kasih-Nya, Dan pasti engkau pun, Tiba di surga.

data.Search: 23*Live Out Thy Life Within Me*Samuel Wesley Frances Ridley Havergal*Live out Thy life within me O Jesus King of kings! Be Thou Thyself the answer to all my questionings Live out Thy life within me in all things have Thy way! I the transparent medium Thy glory to display*The temple has been yielded And purified of sin Let Thy Shekinah glory Now shine forth from within And all the earth keep silence The body henceforth be Thy silent gentle servant Moved only as by Thee*Its members every moment held subject to Thy call Ready to have Thee use them Or not be used at all Held without restless longing Or strain or stress or fret Or chafings at Thy dealings Or thoughts of vain regret*But restful calm and pliant From bend and bias free Awaiting Thy decision when Thou hast need of me Live out Thy life within me O Jesus King of kings Be Thou the glorious answer To all my questionings
data.Judul: Live Out Thy Life Within Me
data.Ayat1: Live out Thy life within me, O Jesus, King of kings! Be Thou Thyself the answer to all my questionings; Live out Thy life within me, in all things have Thy way! I, the transparent medium Thy glory to display.
data.Ayat2: The temple has been yielded, And purified of sin; Let Thy Shekinah glory Now shine forth from within, And all the earth keep silence, The body henceforth be Thy silent, gentle servant, Moved only as by Thee,
data.Ayat3: Its members every moment held subject to Thy call, Ready to have Thee use them, Or not be used at all; Held without restless longing, Or strain, or stress, or fret, Or chafings at Thy dealings, Or thoughts of vain regret;
data.Ayat4: But restful, calm and pliant, From bend and bias free, Awaiting Thy decision, when Thou hast need of me. Live out Thy life within me, O Jesus, King of kings! Be Thou the glorious answer To all my questionings.

data.Search: 24*Hiduplah Dalam Aku*Samuel Wesley Frances Ridley Havergal*Hiduplah dalam aku Ya Yesus Rajaku Aku bawa pada-Mu Sgala perkaraku Hiduplah dalam aku Turut kehendakMu Agar kemuliaan-Mu Nyata dalam aku*Hatiku aku srahkan Bebas dari dosa Hadirat-Mu nyatakan Dalam aku Yesus Mulai skarang Ya Tuhan Pada-Mu ku bersrah Dunia aku tinggalkan Agar dapat surga*Diriku aku s’rahkan Turut kehendak-Mu Sedia melakukan Sgala perintah-Mu Aku takkan melawan Ataupun mengeluh Karna Engkau hentarkan Di dalam kasih-Mu*Tenang aku menunggu Panggilan-Mu Tuhan Kemana engkau suruh Ke sana ku jalan Hiduplah dalam aku Ya Yesus Rajaku Dan biar kehendak-Mu Jadi dalam aku
data.Ayat1: Hiduplah dalam aku, Ya Yesus Rajaku, Aku bawa pada-Mu, Sgala perkaraku; Hiduplah dalam aku, Turut kehendakMu, Agar kemuliaan-Mu Nyata dalam aku.
data.Ayat2: Hatiku aku srahkan, Bebas dari dosa, Hadirat-Mu nyatakan Dalam aku, Yesus; Mulai skarang, Ya Tuhan Pada-Mu ku bersrah, Dunia aku tinggalkan, Agar dapat surga.
data.Ayat3: Diriku aku s’rahkan Turut kehendak-Mu, Sedia melakukan Sgala perintah-Mu; Aku takkan melawan, Ataupun mengeluh, Karna Engkau hentarkan Di dalam kasih-Mu.
data.Ayat4: Tenang aku menunggu Panggilan-Mu Tuhan, Kemana engkau suruh, Ke sana ku jalan; Hiduplah dalam aku, Ya Yesus, Rajaku, Dan biar kehendak-Mu Jadi dalam aku.

data.Ayat2: Long my heart has sighed for Thee; Long as evil reigned within; Jesus sweetly speaks to me, I will cleanse you from all sin.
data.Ayat3: Here I give my all to Thee- Friends, and time, and earthly store; Soul and body Thine to be, Wholly Thine forevermore.
data.Ayat4: Jesus comes! He fills my soul! I am every whitmade whole- Glory, glory to the Lamb!

data.Search: 26*Aku Datang ke Salib*William G Fischer William McDonald*Aku datang kesalib Miskin buta dan lemah Nafsu dunia ku wajib Buang untuk anug’rah*Hendak dapat Rahmat-Nya Lama hatiku rindu Dengar Yesus bersabda aku hapus dosamu*Aku srahkan pada-Mu Harta dunia yang fana Segnap jiwa dan tubuh Pada-Mu ku serah*Yesus isi jiwaku Penuh dengan kuasa-Nya Dan sucilah hatiku Pujilah anak Domba*Aku harap pada-Mu Ya Domba di Golgota Dengarlah seruanku Tolong aku ya Yesus
data.Ayat1: Aku datang kesalib, Miskin, buta dan lemah; Nafsu dunia ku wajib, Buang untuk anug’rah.
data.Ayat2: Hendak dapat Rahmat-Nya, Lama hatiku rindu; Dengar Yesus bersabda, aku hapus dosamu!
data.Ayat3: Aku srahkan pada-Mu, Harta dunia yang fana; Segnap jiwa dan tubuh, Pada-Mu ku serah.
data.Ayat4: Yesus isi jiwaku, Penuh dengan kuasa-Nya; Dan sucilah hatiku, Pujilah anak Domba.
data.Ref: Aku harap pada-Mu, Ya Domba di Golgota, Dengarlah seruanku, Tolong aku, ya Yesus;

data.Search: 27*Near the Cross*William H Doane Fanny J Crosby*Jesus keep me near the cross There a precious fountain Free to all a healing stream Flows from Calvary's mountain*Near the cross a trembling soul Love and mercy found me There the bright and Morning Star Shed His beams around me*Near the cross O Lamb of God Bring its scenes before me Help me walk from day to day With its shadow o'er me*Near the cross I'll watch and wait Hoping trusting ever Till I reach the golden strand Just beyond the river*In the cross in the cross Be my glory ever Till my raptured soul shall find Rest beyond the river

data.Ayat1: Jesus, keep me near the cross; There a precious fountain, Free to all, a healing stream, Flows from Calvary's mountain.
data.Ayat2: Near the cross, a trembling soul, Love and mercy found me; There the bright and Morning Star Shed His beams around me.
data.Ayat3: Near the cross! O Lamb of God, Bring its scenes before me; Help me walk from day to day, With its shadow o'er me.
data.Ayat4: Near the cross I'll watch and wait, Hoping, trusting ever, Till I reach the golden strand, Just beyond the river.
data.Ref: In the cross, in the cross, Be my glory ever, Till my raptured soul shall find Rest beyond the river.

data.Ayat1: O Christian, awake! tis the Master's command. With helmet and shield, and a sword in thy hand, To meet the bold tempter, go, fearlessly go, And stand like the brave, with thy face to the foe.
data.Ref: Stand like the brave, stand like the brave, Stand like the brave with thy face to the foe.
data.Ayat2: What ever thy danger, take heed and beware, And turn not thy back, for no armor is there. The legions of darkness, if thou wouldst o'er throw, Then stand like the brave, with thy face to the foe.
data.Ayat3: The cause of thy Master with vigor defend. Be watchful, be zealous, and fight to the end. Wher ever He leads thee, go, valiantly go, And stand like the brave, with thy face to the foe.
data.Ayat4: Press on, never doubting, thy Captain is near, With grace to supply, and with comfort to cheer. His love, like a stream in the desert will flow. Then stand like the brave, with thy face to the foe.

data.Ayat1: Rescue the perishing, Care for the dying, Snatch them in pity from sin and the grave; Weep o’er the erring one, lift up the fallen, Tell them of Jesus the mighty to save.
data.Ayat2: Though they are slighting Him, Still He is waiting, Waiting the penitent child to receive; Plead with them earnestly, plead with them gently; He will forgive if they only believe.
data.Ayat3: Down in the human heart, Crushed by the tempter, Feelings lie buried that grace can restore; Touched by a loving heart, wakened by kindness, Chords that were broken will vibrate once more.
data.Ayat4: Rescue the perishing, Duty demands it; Strength for thy labor the Lord will provide. Back to the narrow way patiently win them; Tell the poor wanderer a Savior has died.
data.Ref: Rescue the perishing, Care for the dying; Jesus is merciful, Jesus will save.

data.Search: 84*Tolonglah yang Sesat*Fanny J Crosby W H Doane*Tolonglah yang sesat dan hampir mati Lepaskanlah dari dosa cepat Bujuk yang berdosa angkat yang letih Bawalah kepada Juruslamat*Yesus menantikan yang mau bertobat Dan yang mau tinggalkan kejahatan Dengar panggilan-Nya yang penuh rahmat Dengarlah dan engkau diampunkan*Hati yang berduka dan putus asa Tuhan hiburkan oleh sabda-Nya Percaya dan t’rima kasihnya Yesus Dan hidup baru akan dibri-Nya*Menolong yang sesat kewajibanmu Tuhan b’rikan kekuatan padamu Carilah yang sesat di sekitarmu Bawalah pada Jurus’lamatmu*Carilah yang sesat Dalam keglapan Yesus penuh rahmat Mau slamatkan
data.Pengubah: Fanny J. Crosby, W. H. Doane
data.Ayat1: Tolonglah yang sesat, Dan hampir mati, Lepaskanlah dari dosa, cepat; Bujuk yang berdosa, Angkat yang letih, Bawalah kepada Juruslamat.
data.Ayat2: Yesus menantikan Yang mau bertobat, Dan yang mau tinggalkan kejahatan; Dengar panggilan-Nya yang penuh rahmat, Dengarlah! dan engkau diampunkan.
data.Ayat3: Hati yang berduka Dan putus asa, Tuhan hiburkan oleh sabda-Nya; Percaya dan trima Kasihnya Yesus Dan hidup baru akan dibri-Nya.
data.Ayat4: Menolong yang sesat kewajibanmu, Tuhan b’rikan kekuatan padamu; Carilah yang sesat Di sekitarmu, Bawalah pada Juruslamatmu.
data.Ref: Carilah yang sesat Dalam keglapan, Yesus penuh rahmat Mau slamatkan.

data.Search: 86*Tabur Waktu Pagi*George A Minor Knowles Shaw*Tabur waktu pagi benih kebenaranTabur waktu siang dan waktu petang Menanti datangnya waktu penyabitan Kita bawa berkas dengan bergirang*Taburkanlah benih waktu trang atau glap Jangan takut mendung atau angin srang Kerja dan usaha akan berakhir klak Kita bawa berkas dengan bergirang*Tabur dengan tangis tabur untuk Tuhan Meski dalam duka Setan menentang Sesudah tangisan datang kesukaan Kita bawa berkas dengan bergirang*Bawa berkasnya bawa berkasnya Dengan kegirangan bawa berkasnya Bawa berkasnya bawa berkasnya Dengan kegirangan bawa berkasnya
data.Ayat1: Tabur waktu pagi benih kebenaran, Tabur waktu siang dan waktu petang; Menanti datangnya waktu penyabitan, Kita bawa berkas dengan bergirang.
data.Ayat2: Taburkanlah benih waktu trang atau glap, Jangan takut mendung atau angin srang; Kerja dan usaha akan berakhir klak, Kita bawa berkas dengan bergirang.
data.Ayat3: Tabur dengan tangis, tabur untuk Tuhan, Meski dalam duka Setan menentang; Sesudah tangisan, datang kesukaan, Kita bawa berkas dengan bergirang.
data.Ref: Bawa berkasnya, bawa berkasnya, Dengan kegirangan bawa berkasnya, Bawa berkasnya, bawa berkasnya, Dengan kegirangan bawa berkasnya.

data.Search: 88*Berusahalah Kamu*Mrs Anna L Coghill Lowell Mason*Berusahalah kamu Pada waktu pagi Bekerjalah selalu Jangan bersedih Bekerjalah sekarang Janganlah menunggu Malam pun akan datang Habis kerjamu*Berusahalah kamu pada waktu siang Tuntaskanlah kerjamu Saat masih t’rang Perhentianmu senang Di surga yang teduh Malam pasti ‘kan datang Habis lelahmu*Berusahalah kamu Sampai waktu petang Kerjakanlah tugasmu S’lesaikan s’karang Bekerja seb’lum lenyap Sinar matahari Dan tibalah malam g’lap Tugasmu s’lesai

data.Ayat2: Berusahalah kamu, Pada waktu siang; Habiskanlah kerjamu, Waktu masih trang. Perhentianmu senang Di surga yang teduh, Malam pun akan datang, Habis lelahmu.
data.Ayat3: Berusahalah kamu, Sampai waktu petang; Kerjakanlah tugasmu Habiskan skarang. Bekerja seblum lenyap Sinar matahari, Dan tibalah malam glap, Tugasmu slesai.

data.Search: 90*Barang Siapa Dengar Serukanlah*P P Bliss*Barang siapa dengar serukanlah Kabar keslamatan sluruh dunia Masyhurkanlah skarang kabar mulia Mari barang siapa mau*Barang siapa sedia datang lekas Pintu blum tertutup masuklah bebas Hanya Tuhan Yesus boleh bri lepas Mari barang siapa mau*Barang siapa mau teguh janji-Nya Barang siapa mau tahan selamanya Barang siapa mau slamat di bri Tuhan Mari barang siapa mau*Barang siapa mau Barang siapa mau Kabar slamat ini brilah orang tau Allah Bapa kita jemputkan engkau Mari barang siapa mau
data.Ayat1: Barang siapa dengar, serukanlah! Kabar keslamatan sluruh dunia, Masyhurkanlah skarang kabar mulia; Mari, barang siapa mau!
data.Ayat2: Barang siapa sedia, datang lekas! Pintu blum tertutup masuklah bebas Hanya Tuhan Yesus boleh bri lepas, Mari, barang siapa mau.
data.Ayat3: Barang siapa mau! teguh janji-Nya, Barang siapa mau, tahan selamanya, Barang siapa mau, slamat di bri Tuhan, Mari, barang siapa mau.
data.Ref: Barang siapa mau, Barang siapa mau Kabar slamat ini brilah orang tau; Allah, Bapa kita, jemputkan engkau; Mari, barang siapa mau!

data.Search: 91*Can The World See Jesun In*Do We love so close to the Lord today Passing to and fro on life's busy way That the world in us can a likeness see To the man of Calvary*Do we love with love to His own akin All His creature lost in the mire of sin Will we reacg a hand whatsoe'er it cost To reclaim a sinner lost*As an open book they our lives will read To our words and acts giving daily heed Will they be attracted or turn away From the Christ we love today*Can the world see Jesus in me Can the world see Jesus in you Does your love to Him ring true And your life and service too
data.Judul: Can The World See Jesun In
data.Ayat1: Do We Live so close to the Lord today, Passing to and fro on life's busy way; That the world in us can a likeness see To the man of Calvary?
data.Ayat2: Do We love with love to His own akin, All His creature lost in the mire of sin? Will we reach a hand, Whatsoe'er it cost, To reclaim a sinner lost?
data.Ayat3: As an open book they our lives will read, To our words and acts giving daily heed, Will they be attracted, our, turn away, From the Christ we love today?
data.Ref: Can the world see Jesus in me? Can the world see Jesus in you? Does your love to Him ring true, And your life and service, too?

data.Search: 92*Apakah Kita Hidup Dekat*Apa kita hidup dekat Yesus Dalam sibuk kehidupan kita Sehingga dunia melihat Yesus Dalam k'hidupan kita*Apa kitapun nyatakan cinta Pada semua orang yang berdosa Maukah kita s'lamatkan mereka Dari binasa dosa*Apa hidup kita menyatakan Perkataan serta perbuatan Yang menarik atau yang menyesat Orang yang cari s'lamat*Apa dunia lihat Yesus Dalam aku engkau Juga Dalam cintamu itu Dalam bakti hidupmu Apa dunia lihat Yesus
data.Ayat1: Apakah kita hidup dekat Yesus, Dalam sibuk kehidupan kita? Sehingga dunia melihat Yesus, Dalam k'hidupan kita?
data.Ayat2: Apa kitapun nyatakan cinta, Pada semua orang berdosa? Maukah kita s'lamatkan mereka, Dari binasa dosa?
data.Ayat3: Apa hidup kita menyatakan, Perkataan serta perbuatan? Yang menarik atau yang menyesat, Orang yang cari s'lamat?
data.Ref: Apa dunia lihat Yesus, Dalam aku, engkau juga? Dalam cintamu itu, Dalam bakti hidupmu, Apa dunia lihat Yesus?

data.Search: 96*Rahmat Bapa Bercahaya*Rahmat Bapa bercahaya Dari menara Tuhan Tapi pekerjaan kita Menerangi labuhan*Malam dosa sudah tiba Ombak pun bergemuruh Mata rindukan cahaya Dari labuhan*Lampumu s'lalu nyalakan Bagi yang hanyut lelap Yang mau cari pelabuhan Dalam malam yang gelap*Pancarkanlah t'rang lampumu Menerusi gelombang Supaya dapatlah kamu S'lamatkan yang terhilang

data.Search: 99*What a Friend We Have in Jesus*What a Friend we have in Jesus All our sins and griefs to bear What a privilege to carry Every thing to God in prayer O what peace we often forfeit O what needless pain we bear All because we do not carry Every thing to God in prayer*Have we trials and temptations Is there trouble anywhere We should never be discourage Take it to the Lord in prayer Can we find a friend so faithful Who will all our sorrows share Jesus knows our every weakness Take it to the Lord in prayer*Are you weak and heavy laden Cumbered with a load of care Precious Saviour still our refuge Take it the Lord in prayer Do thy friends despise forsake thee Take it to the Lord in prayer In His arms Hell take and shield thee Thou wilt find a solace there
data.Judul: What a Friend We Have in Jesus
data.Pengubah: Charles C. Converse, John M. Scriven
data.Ayat1: What a Friend we have in Jesus, All our sins and griefs to bear! What a privilege to carry, Every thing to God in prayer. O what peace we often forfeit, O what needless pain we bear; All because we do not carry, Every thing to God in prayer!
data.Ayat2: Have we trials and temptations? Is there trouble anywhere? We should never be discourage, Take it to the Lord in prayer. Can we find a friend so faithful, Who will all our sorrows share? Jesus knows our every weakness, Take it to the Lord in prayer.
data.Ayat3: Are you weak and heavy laden, Cumbered with a load of care? Precious Saviour, still our refuge, Take it to the Lord in prayer. Do thy friends despise, forsake thee? Take it to the Lord in prayer; In His arms Hell take and shield thee, Thou wilt find a solace there.

data.Search: 100*Yesus Sahabat Terindah*Yesus Sahabat terindah Yang menghapuskan dosa S'gala pergumulan kita S'rahkanlah dalam doa B'rapa suka pun lenyap Kar'na kita tak bertekun Dalam doa yang tetap*Kalau datang pencobaan Kesukaran dan duka Janganlah putuslah harapan S'rahkanlah dalam doa Manakah teman setia S'perti Yesus Tuhanmu Yang mengerti keluh kita Dalam doa yang sungguh*Bila kita jadi lemah Bebanpun b'rat rasanya Yesuslah penolong kita S'rahkanlah dalam doa Jikalau temanmu undur Haraplah pada Tuhan Ia P'risai dan Penghibur Yang memb'rikan lindungan
data.Pengubah: Charles C. Converse, John M. Scriven
data.Ayat1: Yesus Sahabat terindah, Yang menghapuskan dosa; S'gala pergumulan kita, S'rahkanlah dalam doa! B'rapa susah kita tanggung, B'rapa suka pun lenyap; Kar'na kita tak bertekun, Dalam doa yang tetap.
data.Ayat2: Kalau datang pencobaan, Kesukaran dan duka; Jangan putuslah harapan, S'rahkanlah dalam doa; Manakah teman setia, S'perti Yesus, Tuhanmu? Yang mengerti keluh kita, Dalam doa yang sungguh.
data.Ayat3: Bila kita jadi lemah, Bebanpun b'rat rasanya; Yesuslah penolong lota, S'rahkanlah dalam doa; Jikalau temanmu undur, Haraplah pada Tuhan, Ia P'risai dan Penghibur, Yang memb'rikan lindungan.
